extensionDescription.message: This extension allows you to control a video player by using the mouse wheel.

ponly.message: Playback only ('Middle' value will be used)

mode_title.message: Use the whole video area to change:

allowFS.message: Enable fullscreen (Please type 'about:config' in the address bar and click the button. Then type 'full-screen-api.allow-trusted-requests-only' and change it to 'false'
